Tool Bar Buttons

Create a new molecule layer.
Open an existing molecule file and load it into a new molecule.
Save the current molecule to file.

Enters manipulate mode.
Enters Build mode.
  C Opens a periodic table window to allow the current build element to be changed.
Opens the fragment table which allows selection of either a functional group, EFP or molecule as the build item.
Fill up any remaining valencies with hydrogen atoms.

Minimizes the structure of the molecule using the current molecular mechanics force field. The force field can be selected via the menu Build→Select Force Field.

Enters select mode.

Deletes selected atoms and bonds.
Save a picture of the current viewer window. Several formats are supported including .png and .bmp
Starts recording images for creating a movie. See Making Movies for details.
Enters full-screen mode. Use Ctrl-0 (⌘-0 on Mac) to exit.
Opens this help dialog.
